definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
lit. chrysanthemums after the Double Ninth Festival (idiom)/fig. outdated/thing of the past/dead letter

sentences.english: I will talking with my manager about the bank transfer by Western tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 明日我将会和我们经理讨论通过西联收款的问题。

sentences.english: Michelle Yeoh as Wai Lin, Tomorrow Never Dies, 1997
sentences.chinese: 杨紫琼作为围林，“明日帝国”，1997年。

sentences.english: I leave uncultivated today, was precisely yesterday perishes tomorrow which person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我旷费的今天，正是昨天殒身之人祈求的明日。

sentences.english: Little Scientist of Tomorrow competitiors take part in the final exhibition in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 明日小小科学家显示中国科技的希望。

sentences.english: I wasted today, was precisely yesterday perishes person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我荒废的今日，正是昨日殒身之人祈求的明日。
如今他已成为明日黄花。

sentences.english: This court will adjourn until tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 本法庭暂时休庭，明日继续审理。

sentences.english: Several studies have shown that the investment in future stars rises sharply once laggards have been dumped.
sentences.chinese: 的部门被剥离，“明日之星”得到的投资会迅速增加。

sentences.english: Tomorrow is the day when the evil become good.
sentences.chinese: 明日是弃恶从善的日子。

sentences.english: The today that I have wasted, is the tomorrow that yesterday's dead so desperately wish for.
sentences.chinese: 我旷废的今日，恰是昨日殒身之人期求的明日。

sentences.english: Your life tomorrow will be the result of your attitudes and the choices you make today.
sentences.chinese: 明日的生活之果，孕育于你今天的态度和抉择。

sentences.english: I am not lazy. Tomorrow is the day when the evil becomes good.
sentences.chinese: 明日是弃恶从善的日子，我并不邪恶。

sentences.english: I leave uncultivated today, was precisely yesterday perishes's tomorrow which person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我荒废的今日，恰是昨日殒身之人祈求的明日。

sentences.chinese: 我荒废的今日，正是昨日殒身之人祈求的明日。

definition: future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
